Name: imos LOFT
About the game: imos is now part of the gaming world and shows how to get planning results skillfully in the scene. Steam is a modern visualization tool and a gaming platform at the same time and provides the ideal framework. Many different features await you in our application. Doors can be opened and fitting conditions can be shown, objects such as cups, chairs and plates can be repositioned and immersed in a new world on the computer. In the 'LOFT' the visitors are invited to take a picture of themselves and to marvel at the new possibilities. In our 'LOFT' simulation, you can easily experience how beautiful life can be in a modern loft. A shrill beep, sunshine - welcome home. What's new happens in the world? This tells you your smartphone. First put something on and prepare the breakfast in the kitchen. Design your day in our simulation of 'Living in the Loft' and do not forget to look at the skyline from the roof terrace. Take a look at the depths... Tip: If you do not feel comfortable in the city life, start your computer... The control is intuitive with mouse and keyboard and is always shown in the application. All objects, actions can be executed, appear with a red contour.
